data.name: Mazetools Soniface (Lab Edition)
data.detailed_description:
Create your own audio scenery with rhythms, synthesizer and nature sounds. Make beat sketches with different moods. Get on with new ways to your own song concepts, compositions or audiovisual performances. You can save all creations, scenes and arrangements, load them, add them to others and record the entire sound as an audio file (* .wav).

***

The basic principle of the software is an animated grid. Each line is linked to a sound. As soon as the grid begins to vibrate and deform, sounds are created. Everything is changeable by various tools: shape, color and sound. Utilize multi-touch to control special audiovisual effects.

A drum synthesizer interface offers the possibility to generate beats with different rhythms and to modulate the sound by touch, envelopes, automation and MIDI.

Colors are associated with notes and chords and can be also controlled via a midi keyboard.

The sampler interface allows microphone recording, the integration of your own audio files and included nature shots and everyday sounds.

***

Put on headphones and take some time! The use is very connected with the moment of creation.

Many of our testers said that it took about 10-15 minutes to arrive. Explore Soniface in your own way. A help function accompanies you through all menus.


***

Key features:
* Touch based audiovisual synthesizer grid & circular editing interface
* Rhythm Interface featuring a drum step sequencer & sound modulation setup
* Soundscape sampler incl. mic input, file library & sequencer
* Geometric arpeggiator, note step sequencer with envelope controller
* Color Interface related to a system based on the color organ Scriabin and the circle of fifth

* Pattern based song arrangement section
* 12 grid shapes & special visualization settings
* Shape interface for interactive sound modeling incl. 4 modes of synthesis
* Effect automation section
* Multi touch performance gestures to control audiovisual effects

* Realtime master sound to *.Wav audio recording
* MIDI input to play colors, notes and chords by keyboard or to link effects to controllers
* Plug&play 2nd display output for projectors
* Sound playback from stereo up to 4.0, 5.1 & 7.1 surround
* Save/ load project file section (Mazes & Set)
* In-app tutorial function incl. reading aloud mode


There is a lot to come! With the purchase of Soniface, you directly support the further development. Our small team works permanently and with great passion to improve the quality and add new functions.

data.short_description: Soniface is a multisensual sound and music creator. It combines the intuitive kind of interaction in games, with the virtuosity of handling professional sound tools. Soniface gives you the opportunity to explore new ways to compose and perform soundscapes, beats, songs and sets.
data.reviews:
“VJing and sound app of the extra class!”
Stefan Gisler

“The eyecandy can get pretty intense.”
Musicalandroid

“Mazetools Soniface is a new app that allows you to compose music while relaxing.”
Julia Spyker

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Windows XP
  • Processor: 1.6 GHz
  • Memory: 2 GB RAM
  • Sound Card: Stereo
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: Windows 10
  • Processor: 2.4 GHz
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Storage: 2 GB available space
  • Sound Card: Surround Sound

mac_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Mac OS X 10.8
  • Processor: 1.6 GHz
  • Memory: 2 GB RAM
  • Storage: 500 MB available space
  • Sound Card: Stereo
mac_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: Mac OS X High Sierra
  • Processor: 2.4 GHz
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Storage: 2 GB available space
  • Sound Card: Surround Sound

data.legal_notice:
Soniface is made for personal use. If you have any commercial or business purposes, please contact us.
We recommend the use by headphones, hifi or studio speakers. Please watch the volume level, while acting with Soniface! Be very carefull running Soniface over a PA speaker system! In Soniface you can create audiovisual scenes that might disturb people. Please act carefully!

movies.name: Dive into the maze of music
